caption: A thick plume of white smoke rises steadily from the tall chimney, contrasting sharply against the clear blue sky. As the wind picks up, the smoke begins to drift sideways, unraveling into wispy tendrils that dance and swirl gracefully through the air. The movement creates a dynamic pattern, as the smoke stretches and thins, gradually dispersing into the atmosphere, leaving only faint traces behind.
